name: Solidus Ai Tech
description: Solidus AI Tech has built one of the first Web3 AI infrastructure powered by a state-of-the-art, eco-friendly High-Performance Computing (HPC) data center in Europe. The $AITECH token fuels an ecosystem of products that bridge AI utility, scalable compute, and Web3-native tooling - empowering developers, enterprises, and institutions to build, deploy, and scale AI solutions seamlessly. Solidus Ai Tech Ecosystem Comprehensive platform designed to simplify and scale access to artificial intelligence and computing power. Powered by our 20MW eco-friendly data centre in Europe, and leveraging cutting-edge NVIDIA and SambaNova technologies, our ecosystem delivers the infrastructure and tools needed to thrive in the AI economy. At the core of our ecosystem is the $AITECH Token, a deflationary utility token that enables seamless transactions across our platforms. Designed for long-term value and usability, $AITECH serves as the cornerstone of our digital ecosystem. Our suite of products includes: - Compute Marketplace: A global platform where users can rent GPU power on demand or monetize unused capacity — fast, user-friendly, and secured by blockchain. - AI Marketplace: A hub connecting developers and businesses. Developers can publish and sell AI models, while businesses can discover and deploy ready-to-use AI tools ranging from chatbots to advanced models. - Agent Forge: A no-code platform that empowers users to create and automate AI workflows in minutes — from simple tasks to complex business operations. Through Solidus AI Tech, users gain access to a comprehensive and scalable AI ecosystem, combining innovative infrastructure, accessible compute resources, and powerful AI tools. We are proud to collaborate with a distinguished network of industry-leading partners, including NVIDIA, SambaNova, IBM, Adobe, BNB Chain, Solana, Base, Tron, Ton, Chainlink, Fireblocks, Bitgo, Circle, Hacken, CertiK, Fetch.ai, Zebec Network, Binance Wallet, Trust Wallet, Raydium & PancakeSwap These partnerships strengthen our ability to deliver a secure, reliable, and future-ready AI ecosystem, empowering users to build, run, and grow in the AI economy.
